metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44647 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Lua v5.4.3 and above are affected by SEGV by type confusion in funcnamefromcode function in ldebug.c which can cause a local denial of service.

notes.Note: sbeattie> possibly introduced by 7af27ef59da4051914d93d8b63efac663b64765a mdeslaur> issue is specific to Lua 5.4 only and fixed in 5.4.4.

criterions.comment: lua5.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
lua5.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
